issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1.Create an app with all targets selected except BlackBerry
2.After the app is created open the tiapp.xml & add Blackaberry as a target by selecting it in the 'deployment target' field
3.Save the changes
4.Do a refresh for the project

Actual Results:
1.The BlackBerry folder does not get created in the app's resources folder

Expected Results:
1.The BlackBerry folder should get created
fields.summary: BlackBerry : Adding BlackBerry as target in deployment targets field in tiapp.xml does not add the blackberry folder in app's resources folder
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.v20130320125153
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130319225749
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 
Win 8 
BB simulator : 10.0.10.261
BB simulator : 10.0.9.2372
Dev alpha B 10 device

comments.body:
Verified the fix & the blackberry folder is getting created as expected in the resources folder.
